raw_body: HETTIARACHCHI – DON IVAN PUSHPAPRIYA (JP) – Retired Senior Manager – People’s Bank. Loving husband of Primrose (nee Martil),​ father of Tania,​ Asanka (Cinnamon Bay Beruwela),​ Duwain (Nations Trust Bank),​ father-in-law of Nelia and Dinusha,​ grandfather of Deron,​ Derrel and Joanne,​ brother of Austin (late) Lucian,​ Joseph,​ Shanthi,​ Kumar,​ Mangala and Vinitia,​ expired. Cortege leaves residence No. 259/​2,​ St Anthony’s Place,​ Hendala Road,​ Wattala for Burial at St. Mary’s Church,​ Nayakakanda on Saturday 3.00 p.m. 4th November 2023.071019
